ygData.subject: War and Peace
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the most- in good ways, and in bad ways.  it was the place where they had declared their love to each other.  It was also the place where they were

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Airazor/Sky Lynx/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe:::

::Airazor transforms to beast mode and flies to a spot that she remembered 
the most- in good ways, and in bad ways.  it was the place where they had 
declared their love to each other.  It was also the place where they were 
abducted by the Vok. She lands and transforms. She waits for Tigerhawk::
~~~~~
::Sky Lynx was hit by all of the blasts and bolts. he was starting to bleed 
more steadily.  he fired 2 missles from one gun at Sixshot and 2 from the 
other at Sun Crusher::
~~~~~
::Torca destroys the missles but gets hit by 2 of the bolts.  he fired 13 
explosive shells at Double Punch and 12 at Reflector::
~~~~~
::Ratchet destroyed 1 of the missles but got hit by the other. he dodged the 
ion disks. he fired 15 shots from one gun and 1 tusk missle at Double Punch, 
and 15 shots from his other gun and 1 tusk missle at Manterror::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe jumped back from the grenade, the shrapnel damaging him a bit.  
He fired 2 missles and 25 shots at Ares::

--part1_e2.e63234b.277ec714_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
